author: jonbuddy
title: Great theme. Shame it ended.
review:
Now, this set is still great although it is super tiny and unrealistic. It gets you a bomber jacket, a airplane helmet (if you need one for Anakin Skywalker in 7171, 7159, and 7131), and pieces for an airplane! I reccomend you get this set for your Adventurers collection, or just for the guy and the airplane!

7171: http://brickset.com/detail/?Set=7171-1
7159: http://brickset.com/detail/?Set=7159-1
7131: http://brickset.com/detail/?Set=7131-1

5/5

jonbuddy
